department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Introduction to Portuguese
course.meeting_text: Section I, M., W., 3-5; Section II, Tu., Th., 3-5
course.faculty_text: Clemence Jouet-Pastre and members of the Department
course.description: A basic introductory course for students who can devote only one term to the study of Portuguese. Teaches fundamental communication skills-understanding, speaking, reading and writing-but does not offer a complete study of grammar.
course.notes: Conducted in Portuguese. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students. Not open to auditors. Section on-line on the Portuguese Ba website.
